1:Line
{if boolVal == false}
2: True Value
{/if}
3: Line


1:Line
{if boolVal == true}
2: True Value
{/if}
3: Line


1:Line
2: True Value {if boolVal == true} Some Value{/if}
3: Line


1:Line
2: True Value {if boolVal == false} Some Value{/if}
3: Line


1:Line
{
2 NextLine
}
3 Third


1:Line
{if boolVal == true}2: True value{/if}
3:Line

3:Line

{/if}

{/if}

{/if}

{/if}

{/if}

{/if}
4:Line

1:Line
{if boolVal == true}
{if boolVal == true}
2: True value
{/if}
{/if}
3:Line

1:Line
{if boolVal == false}
{if boolVal == false}
2: False value
{/if}
